subject: Discrimination
Basketball
Race and Ethnicity
lead_paragraph: The N.B.A. is moving to strip Donald Sterling of his ownership of the Los Angeles Clippers, but Sterling’s wife, Rochelle, wants to keep her share of the team.
snippet: The N.B.A. is moving to strip Donald Sterling of his ownership of the Los Angeles Clippers, but Sterling’s wife, Rochelle, wants to keep her share of the team.
